required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Jaktinib Hydrochloride Tablets in the Treatment of Severe Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Jaktinib Hydrochloride Tablets in the Treatment of Severe Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia

brief_summary.textblock: This study adopts a randomized, double-blind, placebo parallel control design, and is expected to include 120 eligible patients with severe novel coronavirus pneumonia.

primary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects with disease progression or all-cause mortality;
The proportion of subjects with disease progression or all-cause mortality;
The proportion of subjects whose (National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease Ordinal Scale (NIAID-OS) score improved by â‰¥ 2 points from the baseline
The change value of NIAID-OS score compared with the baseline
Time interval from randomization to clinical improvement (defined as NIAID-OS 1-3 points)

primary_outcome.measure: Time interval from randomization to discharge

primary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects receiving mechanical ventilation due to disease progression at 3, 7, 14 days after randomization until end of treatment (EOT)

the proportion of subjects whose chest High-Resolution CT (HRCT) showed significant absorption of pulmonary inflammation (definition of significant absorption: the lung inflammatory lesions were reduced by more than 50%) at 7, 14 days after treatment until EOT

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of adverse events and serious adverse events

arm_group.description: Jaktinib hydrochloride tablets, 2 x 50mg dosage, BID

intervention.description: 2 doses per day, each containing two 50mg Jaktinib or placebo tablets
